title: Ardent Affection
description: Larsson TIGER's obsession with the young Emily affects his businesses. He desires her only to him.On his thirty-four birthday he always chooses one of his girls to spend a night with him.Will Emily be chosen tonight?Something unexpected can occur...Emily longs to steal a kiss from the majestically Larsson TIGER, hoping to lure him into a trap, where the ardent affection can be his prison.
author: Pet Torres
